test_queries: SELECT status, COUNT(*) as aantal, COUNT(service_id) as with_service FROM roster_assignments WHERE roster_id='[test_roster_id]' GROUP BY status;
SELECT service_id, aantal, invulling, (aantal-invulling) as nog_nodig FROM roster_period_staffing_dagdelen WHERE roster_id='[test_roster_id]' ORDER BY service_id;
